trans-unit.source: Provides a means of creating and formatting a valid Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document file, complete with appropriate namespaces, elements, and attributes, for describing an XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce un sistema per creare e formattare un file di documento del linguaggio di descrizione dei servizi Web (WSDL, Web Services Description Language) valido, completo di spazi dei nomi, elementi e attributi appropriati, per la descrizione di un servizio Web XML.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe non può essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: Instances of this class can be created with either the `new` keyword or the static <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read%2A> method, which parses a WSDL file and assigns its values to appropriate members of the class.
trans-unit.target: È possibile creare istanze di questa classe con il `new` parola chiave o statico <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read%2A> metodo che analizza un file WSDL e assegna i valori ai membri appropriati della classe.

trans-unit.source: WSDL is an XML-based language for describing XML Web services.
trans-unit.target: WSDL è un linguaggio basato su XML per descrivere i servizi Web XML.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> class corresponds to the root element, `definitions`, of a WSDL file.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> classe corrisponde all'elemento radice, `definitions`, di un file WSDL.

trans-unit.source: For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni su WSDL, vedere la specifica http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> class.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come creare un'istanza della classe <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding" /> elements contained in the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'insieme degli elementi <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding" /> contenuti in <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" />.

trans-unit.source: A collection of binding elements contained in the service description.
trans-unit.target: Raccolta di elementi di associazione contenuti nella descrizione servizio.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.BindingCollection> returned by this property corresponds to the list of `binding` elements enclosed by the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `definitions` root element.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.BindingCollection> restituita da questa proprietà corrisponde all'elenco di `binding` racchiusi da Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `definitions` elemento radice.

trans-unit.source: For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni su WSDL, vedere la specifica http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> represents a valid Web Services Description Language (WSDL) file that can be parsed.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> rappresenta un file del linguaggio di descrizione dei servizi Web (WSDL, Web Services Description Language) valido che possa essere analizzato.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" /> can recognize the node on which the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> is positioned; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" /> può riconoscere il nodo in cui si trova l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of extensibility elements contained in the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'insieme degli elementi di estensibilità contenuti in <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" />.

trans-unit.source: The collection of extensibility elements contained in the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" />.
trans-unit.target: Raccolta degli elementi di estensibilità contenuti in <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Import" /> elements contained in the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'insieme degli elementi <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Import" /> contenuti in <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" />.

trans-unit.source: A collection of import elements contained in the service description.
trans-unit.target: Raccolta di elementi di importazione contenuti nella descrizione servizio.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ImportCollection> returned by this property corresponds to the list of `import` elements enclosed by the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `definitions` root element.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ImportCollection> restituita da questa proprietà corrisponde all'elenco di `import` racchiusi da Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `definitions` elemento radice.

trans-unit.source: For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni su WSDL, vedere la specifica http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Message" /> elements contained in the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'insieme degli elementi <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Message" /> contenuti in <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" />.

trans-unit.source: A collection of message elements contained in the service description.
trans-unit.target: Raccolta di elementi del messaggio contenuti nella descrizione servizio.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MessageCollection> returned by this property corresponds to the list of `message` elements enclosed by the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `definitions` root element.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MessageCollection> restituita da questa proprietà corrisponde all'elenco di `message` racchiusi da Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `definitions` elemento radice.

trans-unit.source: For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni su WSDL, vedere la specifica http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.

trans-unit.source: The XML namespace in which the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> class is defined ("http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/").
trans-unit.target: Spazio dei nomi XML in cui è definita la classe <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> ("http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/").

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: Questo campo è costante.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.PortType" /> elements contained in the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'insieme degli elementi <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.PortType" /> contenuti in <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" />.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.PortType" /> elements contained in the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" />.
trans-unit.target: Raccolta di elementi <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.PortType" /> contenuti in <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.PortTypeCollection> returned by this property corresponds to the list of `portType` elements enclosed by the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `definitions` root element.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.PortTypeCollection> restituita da questa proprietà corrisponde all'elenco di `portType` racchiusi da Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `definitions` elemento radice.

trans-unit.source: For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni su WSDL, vedere la specifica http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> class by directly loading the XML.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza un'istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> caricando direttamente il codice XML.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />, passed by reference, which contains the bytes to be read.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />, passato per riferimento, contenente i byte da leggere.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> class by directly loading the XML from a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza un'istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> caricando il codice XML direttamente da un'istanza di <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" />.
trans-unit.target: Istanza di <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" /> instance, passed by reference, which contains the text to be read.
trans-unit.target: Istanza di <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" />, passata per riferimento, contenente il testo da leggere.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> class by directly loading the XML from a <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" />.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza un'istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> caricando il codice XML direttamente da un oggetto <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" />.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" />.
trans-unit.target: Istanza di <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" />.

trans-unit.source: The path to the file to be read.
trans-unit.target: Percorso del file da leggere.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of a <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> object by directly loading the XML from the specified file.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza un'istanza di un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> caricando il codice XML direttamente dal file specificato.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" />.
trans-unit.target: Istanza di <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />, passed by reference, which contains the XML data to be read.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />, passato per riferimento, contenente i dati XML da leggere.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> class by directly loading the XML from an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza un'istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> caricando il codice XML direttamente da un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" />.
trans-unit.target: Istanza di <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />, passed by reference, which contains the bytes to be read.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />, passato per riferimento, contenente i byte da leggere.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> that indicates whether the XML should be validated against the schema specified by <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Schema" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> che indica se XML deve essere conalidato sulla base dello schema specificato da <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Schema" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> class by directly loading the XML from a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza un'istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> caricando il codice XML direttamente da un'istanza di <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" />.
trans-unit.target: Istanza di <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" />.

trans-unit.source: The path to the file to be read.
trans-unit.target: Percorso del file da leggere.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> that indicates whether the XML should be validated against the schema specified by <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Schema" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> che indica se XML deve essere conalidato sulla base dello schema specificato da <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Schema" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of a <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> object by directly loading the XML from the specified file.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza un'istanza di un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> caricando il codice XML direttamente dal file specificato.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" />.
trans-unit.target: Istanza di <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />, passed by reference, which contains the XML data to be read.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />, passato per riferimento, contenente i dati XML da leggere.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> that indicates whether the XML should be validated against the schema specified by <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Schema" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> che indica se XML deve essere conalidato sulla base dello schema specificato da <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Schema" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> class by directly loading the XML from an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza un'istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> caricando il codice XML direttamente da un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" />.
trans-unit.target: Istanza di <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> that indicates whether the XML should be validated against the schema specified by <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Schema" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> che indica se XML deve essere conalidato sulla base dello schema specificato da <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Schema" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> class by directly loading the XML from a <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" />.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza un'istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> caricando il codice XML direttamente da un oggetto <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" />.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" />.
trans-unit.target: Istanza di <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL of the XML Web service to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> instance applies.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'URL del servizio Web XML a cui si applica l'istanza di <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" />.

trans-unit.source: The URL of the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: URL del servizio Web XML.

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è una stringa vuota ("").

trans-unit.source: Gets the schema associated with this <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene lo schema associato a questo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" />.

trans-unit.source: The schema associated with this <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" />.
trans-unit.target: Schema associato all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the XML serializer used to serialize and deserialize between a <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> object and a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il serializzatore XML utilizzato per serializzare e deserializzare tra un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> e un documento WSDL.

trans-unit.source: The XML serializer used to serialize and deserialize between a <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> object and a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document.
trans-unit.target: Serializzatore XML utilizzato per serializzare e deserializzare tra un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> e un documento WSDL (Web Services Description Language).

trans-unit.source: The XML serializer can be customized using classes derived from the abstract <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension> class.
trans-unit.target: Il serializzatore XML può essere personalizzato tramite le classi derivate dalla classe astratta <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension> classe.

trans-unit.source: These classes are specified in a configuration file using the `serviceDescriptionFormatExtensionTypes` element and its child `add` element.
trans-unit.target: Queste classi vengono specificate in un file di configurazione utilizzando il `serviceDescriptionFormatExtensionTypes` elemento e del relativo figlio `add` elemento.

trans-unit.source: The configuration can be applied to an ASP.NET Web application that publishes a Web service.
trans-unit.target: La configurazione può essere applicata a un'applicazione Web ASP.NET che pubblica un servizio Web.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionCollection" /> instance of which the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> is a member.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'istanza di <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionCollection" /> di cui <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> è membro.

trans-unit.source: A collection of service description.
trans-unit.target: Raccolta di descrizione del servizio.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> has not been assigned to a parent collection.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> non è stato assegnato a un insieme padre.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Service" /> instances contained in the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'insieme delle istanze di <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Service" /> contenute in <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" />.

trans-unit.source: A collection of service instances contained in the service description.
trans-unit.target: Raccolta di istanze del servizio contenute nella descrizione servizio.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceCollection> returned by this property corresponds to the list of `service` elements enclosed by the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `definitions` root element.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceCollection> restituita da questa proprietà corrisponde all'elenco di `service` racchiusi da Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `definitions` elemento radice.

trans-unit.source: For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni su WSDL, vedere la specifica http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the XML <see langword="targetNamespace" /> attribute of the <see langword="descriptions" /> tag enclosing a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) file.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'attributo XML <see langword="targetNamespace" /> del tag <see langword="descriptions" /> che racchiude un file del linguaggio di descrizione dei servizi Web (WSDL, Web Services Description Language).

trans-unit.source: The URL of the XML Web service described by the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" />.
trans-unit.target: URL del servizio Web XML descritto da <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Types" /> contained by the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Types" /> contenuto dall'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Types" /> instance that represents the data types of both the parameters and return values of the methods exposed by the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: Istanza di <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Types" /> che rappresenta i tipi di dati dei parametri e dei valori restituiti dei metodi esposti dal servizio Web XML.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Types> instance returned by this property corresponds to the list of `types` elements enclosed by the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `definitions` root element.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Types> istanza restituita da questa proprietà corrisponde all'elenco di `types` racchiusi da Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `definitions` elemento radice.

trans-unit.source: For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni su WSDL, vedere la specifica http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection" /> that contains any validation warnings that were generated during a call to <see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read(System.IO.Stream,System.Boolean)" />, <see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read(System.IO.TextReader,System.Boolean)" />, <see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read(System.String,System.Boolean)" />, or <see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read(System.Xml.XmlReader,System.Boolean)" /> with the <paramref name="validate" /> parameter set to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection" /> contenente tutti gli avvisi di convalida generati durante una chiamata all'oggetto <see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read(System.IO.Stream,System.Boolean)" />, <see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read(System.IO.TextReader,System.Boolean)" />, <see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read(System.String,System.Boolean)" /> o <see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read(System.Xml.XmlReader,System.Boolean)" /> con il parametro <paramref name="validate" /> impostato su <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection" /> that contains any validation warnings that were generated during a call to <see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read(System.IO.Stream,System.Boolean)" />, <see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read(System.IO.TextReader,System.Boolean)" />, <see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read(System.String,System.Boolean)" />, or <see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read(System.Xml.XmlReader,System.Boolean)" /> with the <paramref name="validate" /> parameter set to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection" /> contenente tutti gli avvisi di convalida generati durante una chiamata all'oggetto <see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read(System.IO.Stream,System.Boolean)" />, <see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read(System.IO.TextReader,System.Boolean)" />, <see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read(System.String,System.Boolean)" /> o <see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read(System.Xml.XmlReader,System.Boolean)" /> con il parametro <paramref name="validate" /> impostato su <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: Writes out the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> as a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) file.
trans-unit.target: Scrive l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> come file del linguaggio di descrizione dei servizi Web (WSDL, Web Services Description Language).

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />, passed by reference, which contains the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) file produced.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />, passato da un riferimento, contenente il file del linguaggio di descrizione dei servizi Web (WSDL, Web Services Description Language) prodotto.

trans-unit.source: Writes out the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> to the specified <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.
trans-unit.target: Scrive l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> nell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> specificato.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" /> that contains the WSDL file produced.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" /> che contiene il file WSDL prodotto.

trans-unit.source: Writes out the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> as a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) file to the <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" />.
trans-unit.target: Scrive l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> come file del linguaggio di descrizione dei servizi Web (WSDL, Web Services Description Language) in <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" />.

trans-unit.source: The path to which the WSDL file is written.
trans-unit.target: Percorso in cui viene scritto il file WSDL.

trans-unit.source: Writes out the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> as a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) file to the specified path.
trans-unit.target: Scrive l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> come file del linguaggio di descrizione dei servizi Web (WSDL, Web Services Description Language) nel percorso specificato.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />, passed by reference, which contains the WSDL file produced.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />, passato per riferimento, contenente il file WSDL prodotto.

trans-unit.source: Writes out the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> to the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> as a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) file.
trans-unit.target: Scrive l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> in <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> come file del linguaggio di descrizione dei servizi Web (WSDL, Web Services Description Language).

trans-unit.source: ServiceDescription_Read#4
trans-unit.target: ServiceDescription_Read#4
